---
Spike and her friends live in the future where the Earth has become so polluted that they must live underground. As legend has it, a creature that "Walks on Air" will guide them to a place where there are blue skies and green meadows.
---

I had been searching for a downloadable copy everywhere, but just couldn't find it. There supposedly a few worn VHS copies left among the public, but a DVD version was never released. The movie is long out of production, and the only way the creaters can possibly get more money out of this movie, is to spread the message.

This copy is supposedly a rip of a VHS tape that someone put online in parts. I just combined them back together and made a torrent out of them. I wish I could provide higher quality, but at least this is better than nothing.

Also, sorry for the slow initial seeding. I simply don't have anything faster. Please do keep seeding! Help revive this long gone child memory, from a time when animators were not afraid of showing kids the blunt truth!

Audio language: Danish
